page.title: 19EMPLOYMENT IN HARNHAM
page.content: Employment in Harnham is restricted. There are few industries involving many employees. Most of the local employment bases are small, such as village shops,pubs,schools, etc. There are 6 farms in and around Harnham, but dueto high_tech modern machinery, farmers require few to work the farm. The three garages in Harnham also only employ few _ 3 of them being self_service for petrol. The main sources of employment are the 3 hospitals. There is a general hospital, one for the elderly, and a research unit studying the common cold.The sewage works and a small printing workshop complete the employment opportunities in Harnham.
